attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Brown lacks integrity and therfore should resign his post as Prime Minister.
He is a liar and is lowering the standing of the UK on the world stage.
He has failed to lead this country, and his lies to the Chilcott inquirey should be the final nail in his LID.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
